statements: SELECT * FROM wine_reviews WHERE rating > 90;
SELECT wine_name, winery_name FROM wine_reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT winery_name, rating FROM wine_reviews WHERE review_date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date, rating FROM wine_reviews WHERE wine_name LIKE 'Chardonnay%';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name FROM wine_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 80 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM wine_reviews WHERE rating > 90 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT wine_name, winery_name, reviewer_name FROM wine_reviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT reviewer_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM wine_reviews GROUP BY reviewer_name HAVING avg_rating > 85;
SELECT DISTINCT winery_name FROM wine_reviews ORDER BY winery_name ASC;
SELECT review_id, wine_name, rating FROM wine_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC, review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM WineReviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT reviewer_name, wine_name, rating FROM WineReviews WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM Reviewers WHERE country = 'France' AND join_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM WineReviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM WineReviews;
SELECT * FROM WineReviews WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC
SELECT wine_name, reviewer_name FROM WineReviews WHERE reviewer_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT reviewer_name, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM WineReviews GROUP BY reviewer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM WineReviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0
SELECT * FROM Reviewers WHERE country = 'France'
SELECT * FROM wine_reviews ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, wine_name, rating FROM wine_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT wine_name, review_text FROM wine_reviews WHERE LOWER(user_name) LIKE 'john%';
SELECT * FROM wine_reviews WHERE rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY wine_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT region_name, country FROM wine_regions WHERE climate = 'Cool';
SELECT * FROM wine_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT wine_name, rating FROM wine_reviews WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT user_name, wine_name, rating FROM wine_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%delicious%' ORDER BY wine_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, country FROM wine_regions WHERE climate = 'Cool';
SELECT variety_name, color, acidity, body FROM wine_varieties WHERE acidity > 0.6 ORDER BY variety_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Wine WHERE type='Red' ORDER BY vintage DESC;
SELECT name, country FROM Wine WHERE region='Bordeaux' AND vintage > 2010;
SELECT name, type, country FROM Wine WHERE type IN ('White', 'Rosé') ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, name, type, vintage FROM Wine WHERE country='Italy' AND region='Tuscany';
SELECT * FROM Review WHERE rating >= 90 ORDER BY rating DESC, date_reviewed ASC;
SELECT * FROM Wine WHERE type = 'Red' ORDER BY vintage DESC, region ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, type, country FROM Wine WHERE vintage >= 2010 AND country IN ('France', 'Italy') ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT r.rating, r.reviewer, rv.review_text FROM Rating r JOIN Review rv ON r.wine_id = rv.wine_id WHERE r.rating >= 90 AND rv.rating < 3 ORDER BY r.rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT w.name, w.type, r.rating, r.date_reviewed FROM Wine w JOIN Rating r ON w.id = r.wine_id WHERE r.date_reviewed >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY r.date_reviewed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT w.country, r.reviewer FROM Wine w JOIN Rating r ON w.id = r.wine_id WHERE w.country = 'Spain' AND r.rating <= 85 ORDER BY r.rating ASC, r.reviewer DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Wines;
SELECT wine_id, wine_name FROM Wines ORDER BY wine_name DESC;
SELECT wine_name, wine_type FROM Wines WHERE wine_type = 'Red';
SELECT wine_name, wine_region FROM Wines WHERE wine_year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM Winemakers WHERE winery_name LIKE '%Vineyards%';
SELECT * FROM Wines WHERE wine_type = 'Red' ORDER BY wine_year DESC;
SELECT wine_name, wine_region FROM Wines WHERE wine_year = 2010 AND wine_type = 'White';
SELECT winemaker_name, winery_name, COUNT(winery_name) AS wines_produced FROM Winemakers JOIN Wines ON Winemakers.winemaker_id = Wines.wine_id GROUP BY winemaker_id HAVING COUNT(wine_id) > 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM TastingEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date;
SELECT taster_name, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM Tasters JOIN Ratings ON Tasters.taster_id = Ratings.taster_id GROUP BY taster_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
